title: Jungle Escape in Nepal's #1 Lodge
description: Immerse yourself in the Nepalese jungle with a stay at Barahi Jungle Lodge, the #1 lodge in the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Chitwan National Park. Spend three nights in a cottage and enjoy daily breakfast, one Nepali thali per person, one bush dining experience under the starlit sky, a complimentary bottle of wine, a close encounter with elephants and a generous NPR 1000 spa credit.
